[2] TOL (857 Î¼M), TCE (827 Î¼M), and PERC (152 Î¼M) rapidly and reversibly blocked ICa in NGF-differentiated PC12 cells (Figs. 1 and 2).  [3] Leak and capacitive currents were not altered by any of the VOCs (data not shown).  [4] To confirm that effects of VOCs were not due to solubilization of unknown compounds from the delivery system tubing , separate experiments were conducted wherein extracellular solution containing each VOC was added manually via glass pipette directly to the recording chamber (i.e., there was no contact of the VOC containing solution with polyethylene tubing).  [5] Using this exposure method, effects of TOL, TCE, and PERC were identical to those observed when VOCs were delivered via tubing (data not shown).
